external_games.name: Sentinels of the Multiverse - Villains of the Multiverse

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Villains of the Multiverse
summary: Villains of the Multiverse is a mega-expansion that adds to the Villain Team Mode introduced in the Vengeance expansion. This expansion includes ten villains, which can be faced in any configuration and combined with Vengeance villains, as well as four exciting new environments.
